item.description:
This trail makes a loop over North and South Baldface. It is one of the most attractive trips in the White Mountains, with about 4 mi. of open and semi-open ledge providing long stretches of unobstructed views and equally great exposure to storms. This is a strenuous trip that should not be underestimated. The hike is 9.1 miles with 3618 of elevation gain. Book time is six hours 22 minutes. Bad weather will cancel. Please answer the questions and make sure you have all required gear.

 

Weather:

 

http://forecast.weather.gov/MapClick.php?CityName=Center+Conway&state=NH&site=GYX&lat=43.9731&lon=-71.0462

 

Gear list:

http://hbbostonamc.org/docs/Gear_lists/Spring_Dayhike_gear_list.pdf
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in a silver Corolla.
item.name: Baldfaces in Autumn
